title: 🌡️ Beehive IoT sensors
description: 🌡️ Beehive IoT sensors are essentially smart scales equipped with additional sensors and communication chips. They periodically measure the hive's state and send data to a web app. This aggregated data helps beekeepers monitor their colonies in the field with minimal costs.
